          <title>
            <string language="es">La elipse</string>
            <string language="en">The ellipse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Ellipse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ellipse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ellipse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'ellisse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η έλλειψη</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que permite mover un punto con sus dos radio vectores a lo largo de una elipse</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which allows the user to move a dot with its two position vectors along an elliptical path</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cónicas</string>
            <string language="en">conic section</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">elipse</string>
            <string language="en">ellipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Simulation, die dem Benutzer erlaubt, 
einen Punkt mit seinen zwei Position Vektoren entlang einem 
elliptischen Pfad zu verschieben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation interactive qui permet à l'utilisateur
de déplacer un point avec ses vecteurs de deux positions le long 
d'une voie d'accès elliptique</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simulação interativa que permite que o usuário 
mova um ponto com seus vetores de duas posições ao longo de um 
trajeto elíptico</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione interattiva che permette che l'utente 
sposti un puntino con i relativi vettori di due posizioni lungo un 
percorso ellittico</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική προσομοίωση που επιτρέπει στο χρήστη για να 
κινήσει ένα σημείο με δύο διανύσματα θέσης της κατά μήκος 
ενός ελλειπτικού μονοπατιού</string>
          </description>
